original: Lindal, Göran Vilhelm Gideon, redaktör, Jönköping, f. 18/4/94 i Jönköp. av P. J. L. o. Augusta Göransdtr. G. 22 m. Ingeborg Sjö’stedt. Barn: Lill-bojan f. 23, Kurt 26, Kerstin 29, Karin 33. — Realex. 11, ■stud:ex. 15. Res. t. Tyskl. o. Danm. Anst. v. Sv. Tel:byråns Gbgsfil. 19, i Västerås 20, v. Hall :posten i Halmstad t. 32, v. Smål. Alleh. i Jönköp. t. 44, v. Smål:-bygd. Tidn. fr. 44. Led. av kyrko-fuHm., sekr. i Hall. automo^bilkl., ordf. i stadsrev,, ’sekr. i Smål.-krets, av Sv. journ:fören. Hobby: Fridatolkning.
translated: Lindal, Göran Vilhelm Gideon, editor, Jönköping, born April 18, 1894 in Jönköping. Son of P. J. L. and Augusta Göransdtr. Married to Ingeborg Sjö’stedt in 1922. Children: Lill-bojan born in 1923, Kurt in 1926, Kerstin in 1929, Karin in 1933. Completed Realexamen in 1911, studied to become a studentexamen in 1915. Worked for Swedish Telegraph Agency in Gothenburg from 1919, in Västerås from 1920, at Halland Post Office in Halmstad until 1932, at Småland Allehanda in Jönköping until 1944, and at Småland-bygd Tidning from 1944. Member of the church council, secretary of Halland Automobile Club, chairman of city revenue, secretary of Småland district of the Swedish Journalist Association. Hobby: Interpretation of peace.

memberOf.name: Småland district of the Swedish Journalist Association
